skillTree.name: The Endless Hunters
skillTree.description: Waystalkers are no more than their next hunt. Every breath advances their chase, bringing them closer to victory.

effects.description: Reload time reduction: +3% during forest battles
Reload time reduction: +7% during forest battles
Reload time reduction: +15% during forest battles

skillTree.name: Ward of Loec
skillTree.description: The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.

skillTree.name: Ward of Hoeth
skillTree.description: Knowledge can be used as a shield against magical attack.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: The Hunt
skillTree.description: Only few can receive blessing of mighty God of the Hunt.

skillTree.name: Arrow of Kurnous
skillTree.description: When the arrow flies farther, it may kill sooner, which is vital in the Hunt.

ui_effects.description: ➕ Fires 3 projectiles each dealing 50 250 damage and 25 140 explosion damage (2m)

skillTree.name: Fleetfinger
skillTree.description: Nook and fire. Nook again, and fire. Nook a third time, and fire. All in a heartbeat.

skillTree.name: Piercing Shots
skillTree.description: The forest teaches a warrior not only when to fire but where, which makes a bigger difference.

skillTree.name: Bottomless Quiver
skillTree.description: Always willing to fight on, a widened quiver allows arrows to rain, almost without end.

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

skillTree.name: Prey of Anath Raema
skillTree.description: By all means summon the bloodthirsty Goddess of the Hunt to assist you, but always make sure you thank her afterwards…

skillTree.name: Swordplayer
skillTree.description: The sword is the axis of the world and its power is absolute.

skillTree.name: Endurance of the Oak
skillTree.description: Taking their cue from the forest itself, the Lord endures and overcomes all.

skillTree.name: Tempered Rigour
skillTree.description: When to strike, when to block, when to dodge. These are all skills the warriors of Athel Loren must perfect.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Scouting Ahead
skillTree.description: Once the sun sets, the Waystalker leaves camp, returning before dawn to deliver their report.

skillTree.name: Cleanse the Forest
skillTree.description: The enemies of Athel Loren will fall.

skillTree.name: Sabotage
skillTree.description: Waystalkers move unseen, unheard, and unnoticed.

skillTree.name: Pick Them Off
skillTree.description: Our arrows can kill from any distance.

skillTree.name: Cunning
skillTree.description: The perils of Athel Loren are far greater than the pathetic machinations of mortals.

skillTree.name: The Eye of Kurnous
skillTree.description: The Lord sets their eye upon the foe, imbuing their troops with Kurnous' spirit and the will to see his enemies destroyed.

skillTree.name: Sight Beyond Sight
skillTree.description: Waystalkers’ keen eyes can spot an enemy at a distance that defies belief, and so they demand the same of their troops.

skillTree.name: Hidden Paths
skillTree.description: There is always another way.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Disciple
skillTree.description: Useful, if a bit impetuous.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +1% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +3% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +6% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Notorious
skillTree.description: It’s difficult to sleep with one eye open and a dagger under your pillow.

skillTree.name: Contacts
skillTree.description: Sometimes it’s best to have friends in low places.

skillTree.name: Shadow
skillTree.description: Always watching.

skillTree.name: Grandmaster
skillTree.description: They’ve all heard the stories of this one’s accomplishments. The stories, of course, pale in comparison to the truth.

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_training}}
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 25
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 100

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_spread_public_order}}
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 1
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 2
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_assault_garrison}}
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 20% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_assassinate}}
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_assault_units}}
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 2% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

skillTree.name: Ariel's Chosen
skillTree.description: Those whom the Mage Queen has favoured fight as if powered by her hand.

skillTree.name: Talon of Kurnous
skillTree.description: The first arrow of battle must fly truest.

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

skillTree.name: Cunning
skillTree.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

skillTree.name: Determined
skillTree.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

skillTree.name: Confident
skillTree.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

skillTree.name: Disciplined
skillTree.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

skillTree.name: Perceptive
skillTree.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

skillTree.name: Aggressive
skillTree.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

skillTree.name: Tough
skillTree.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

skillTree.name: Strong
skillTree.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

skillTree.name: Weapon Master
skillTree.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

skillTree.name: Strategist
skillTree.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

skillTree.name: Tactician
skillTree.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

skillTree.name: Chosen of Asuryan
skillTree.description: Atop a great pyramid in the highest heaven, Asuryan watches over the world alone and has never been seen by mortals.

effects.description: Upkeep: -10% for Great Eagle and Hawk Rider units

skillTree.name: Hoeth Wisdom
skillTree.description: Whatever the motivation, legend tells that when Asuryan learned of Hoeth's actions, he rebuked the Lord of Wisdom, and in punishment, set much of Hoeth's great library ablaze.

skillTree.name: Blessing of Isha
skillTree.description: As the goddess of nature, Isha taught the Elves how to care for the land and gain a plentiful harvest.

skillTree.name: Ways of Ladrielle
skillTree.description: By tradition, she is the only goddess to any longer walk the mortal world, and there are tales of her coming to the aid of those lost amidst the mists of Yvresse or upon the trackless ocean.

skillTree.name: Light of Lileath
skillTree.description: It is claimed that she reads the intention written in the heart of every elf and judges them not by their deeds, but by their hearts desire.

skillTree.name: Blade of Loec
skillTree.description: The Elf legends tell that Loec often saves the souls of the dead from Slaanesh by tricking the Dark Prince out of his prize.

effects.description: Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -15

skillTree.name: Vaul's Will
skillTree.description: Enslaved to Khaine's will, Vaul is forced to make weapons of extraordinary power for the War God's eternal battle against the great enemy.
